column2: A quarterly survey conducted by the Department of Economic Statistics
Low-income group refers to households with monthly family income of less than P10,000.
Middle-income group refers to households with monthly family income between P10,000-P29,999.
High-income group refers to households with monthly family income of more than P30,000.
Starting Q1 2019, the monthly family income is estimated using income from the respondent, spouse, other family members, and received OFW remittances.

column1: Due to the implementation of the Community Quarantine nationwide, the conduct of the Q2 2020 CES was cancelled.
